price: 190. Mpe bobundisa baye bazali kobundisa bino na nzela ya Allah, mpe bolekisa ndelo te; ya sôló Allah alingaka te baye bazali kolekisa ndelo.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡتَدُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi alladhīna yuqātilūnakum walā taʿtadū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
